allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: remove definition semantics, use shape metadata for visualization

Remove all defineMachine/defineSubmachine usage from codebase and replace
with shape-based visualization approach.

Changes:
- Remove defineMachine imports from all examples
- Update buildHierarchicalShape to discover all states, not just current
- Fix visualization to discover submachines via machineFactory property
- Add synthetic parent states for flattened machines \(Payment state\)
- Fix state constructors to return {} instead of undefined

Test results: 130/130 unit tests passing

Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
via [Happy]\(https://happy.engineering\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
Co-Authored-By: Happy <yesreply@happy.engineering>
EOF
\)")
